name: Road Rules
description:
In this racing/stealth game, the goal is to drive back to your house as fast as possible... while also following the rules of the road. NO driving on the grass or hitting traffic cones along the way!

Note: The web version is extremely laggy :(. I highly recommend downloading the game and running the .exe file!

Link to the game's Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/road-rules
